article.title: North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
article.summary: Learn about the key parts of the North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA) and the process for obtaining benefits.
article.content:
North America Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)

NAFTA allows your company to ship most goods to customers in Canada and Mexico duty free as long as they are comprised mostly of U.S. components. This video covers the key parts of the agreement and introduces the process for obtaining the benefits.

For further questions, call 1-800-USA-TRAD E.
article.seometadatadescription: Learn about the key parts of the North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA) and the process for obtaining benefits.
article.seometadatakeyword: NAFTA, free trade, export training, webinar
